hero.title: E-Holdings
hero.subtitle: Turagukurikirana
hero.text: Waba uri umuntu ku giti cye cyangwa nyir'ubucuruzi, imbaraga zacu kandi byoroshye-gukoresha-gukoresha byoroshye kuyobora no kurinda ibikoresho byawe

deviceLookup.title: Ntabwo uzi neza igikoresho ugiye kugura? Reka tugufashe kugenzura.
deviceLookup.text: Nubushobozi bwacu bukomeye bwo gushakisha, urashobora kwihuta kandi byoroshye igikoresho icyo aricyo cyose ushakisha hamwe nindangamuntu yihariye nka numero yuruhererekane, IMEI cyangwa andi makuru yose yerekana kugirango umenye neza ko itibwe

fileOrganization.title: Uri nyir'ubucuruzi?
fileOrganization.text: E-gufata neza iguha ibikoresho bikomeye byo gucunga no kurinda ibarura ryawe. Urashobora gukurikirana byoroshye ibikoresho wagurishije, kugenzura garanti isigaye, no gutanga raporo zirambuye kugirango wongere ibikorwa byawe.

list.keep: Komeza ukurikirane ibikoresho biri muri garanti

shortAboutUs.title: Ibyuma bya elegitoroniki byose, bicungirwa ahantu hamwe kubitunga bidasubirwaho
shortAboutUs.subtitle: NIKI TUGUKORA?

track.title: Kurikirana ibikoresho
track.text: E-Holdings yoroshya gukurikirana ibikoresho byawe uko byagenda kose. Hamwe nibikoresho byacu bikomeye byumuryango, uzahora ubona ari urwenya kugirango ukurikirane ibikoresho byawe, turi hano kugirango tuguhe amahoro yo mumutima

transfer.title: Hindura nyirubwite
transfer.text: E-Holdings byoroshya inzira yo kwimura ibikoresho nyirubwite. Waba wimura igikoresho kuri nyiracyo mushya cyangwa kukigura mumuryango, urubuga rwacu rworoshe.

report.title: Menyesha ibikoresho byibwe
report.text: Hamwe na E-holdings, urashobora kwihutira kumenyesha abayobozi ibikoresho byabuze cyangwa byibwe. Sisitemu yacu yo gutanga raporo yerekana inzira, urashobora rero kuruhuka byoroshye uzi ibikoresho byawe birinzwe kandi byiteguye kuboneka igihe icyo aricyo cyose cyatakaye.

generate.title: Kora inyandiko zawe zose
generate.text: E-Holdings ibyemezo bitanga amasezerano byemewe n'amategeko hamwe nibikoresho byawe, biguha uburinzi ukeneye. Hamwe nimiterere yinyandiko yacu, urashobora gukora byoroshye no gucunga amasezerano nibindi byangombwa.

left.title: Turakumva!
left.subTitle: Tura Kworosha ubuzima!
left.text: Imigaragarire yacu-yumukoresha hamwe nubufasha butagereranywa bwabakiriya byorohereza umuntu wese gukoresha E-gufata. Turahora dukora kugirango tunoze serivisi zacu kandi tuyikoreshe neza-bishoboka, niba ufite ikibazo cyangwa icyifuzo gisabwa, ntutindiganye kutwandikira

right.title: Kuki wa duhitamo?
right.subTitle: Ntabwo ari ugukurikirana ibikoresho gusa!
right.text: E-holdings birenze igikoresho cyo gukurikirana no kuyobora ibikoresho, ni igisubizo cyuzuye cyo kurinda ibikoresho byawe nubucuruzi bwawe. Hamwe nimikorere yacu yiterambere hamwe nubushakashatsi bwimbitse bwabakoresha, urashobora gufata ibyemezo byawe kandi ukarinda ejo hazaza

Faq.title: Ntushobora kubona ikintu?
Faq.subTitle: Urashobora gushaka kugenzura ibibazo byacu, cyangwa ukatwandikira kugirango ubone ibisobanuro byinshi

one.title: Bigenda bite iyo mbuze ijambo ryibanga rya E-gufata?
one.text: Niba utakaje ijambo ryibanga rya E-gufata konte yawe, urashobora kuyisubiramo ukoresheje ijambo ryibanga ryibanga. Uzabazwa numero ya terefone wakoresheje kugirango winjire hamwe na id yawe kugirango umenye umwirondoro wawe.

two.title: Ninde ushobora kubona ibikoresho byanjye nibikoresho byamakuru?
two.text: Gusa abakoresha babiherewe uburenganzira bafite ibyangombwa byukuri barashobora kubona amakuru yibikoresho byawe namakuru yihariye

one.title: Bigenda bite iyo kimwe mu bikoresho byanjye cyatakaye cyangwa cyibwe?
one.text: Niba kimwe mubikoresho byawe cyatakaye cyangwa cyibwe, urashobora kubimenyesha ukoresheje E-gufata. Ihuriro ryacu riragufasha kumenyesha byoroshye ibikoresho byabuze cyangwa byibwe kubayobozi no gukurikirana aho biherereye

two.title: Nigute E-gufata irinda ibikoresho byanjye namakuru yanjye bwite?
two.text: E-gufata ikoresha protocole yumutekano isanzwe hamwe na encryption kugirango urinde ibikoresho byawe namakuru yihariye. Amakuru yose yoherejwe kandi abitswe neza, kandi kwinjira bigenzurwa binyuze mukwemeza no gutanga uburenganzira.

help.title: Ukeneye ubufasha bwinshi?
help.subTitle: Reba ibibazo byacu ushobora kubona inama zingirakamaro

footer.subTitle: Mudushakire kurubuga urwo arirwo rwose, turasubiza mumasaha 24.
